FinancePyomo module¶

author: young

FinancePyomo.f_con_overdraw(params)¶

Constrains the level of overdraw in each cashflow period.

This ensures the model draws a realistic level of money from the bank. The user can specify the maximum overdraw level.

FinancePyomo.fin_precalcs(params, r_vals)¶

Call finance precalc functions.

Parameters

  • params – dictionary which stores all arrays used to populate pyomo parameters.

  • report – dictionary which stores all report values.

FinancePyomo.finpyomo_local(params)¶

Builds pyomo variables, parameters and constraints

Australian Farm Optimisation Model
